name: a deep dive into atoms and molecules
full_name: h1 Introduction h2 SPECIAL NOTE h1 Data Visualizations h2 Dipole Moment of Molecules h2 Molecular Structure with respect to atomic index h2 Scalar Coupling of Molecules h2 Mulliken charge of the atom h2 magnetic shielding tensors h2 Training Data Set h2 Relation between Scalar Coupling Y axis Spin dipolar Paramagnetic spin orbit Diamagnetic spin orbit h1 Model Implementation h3 Pre Process Data h2 Lets see which regressor works better CatBoost or my all time favourite KNN regressor h3 KNN Model h2 CatBoost Model h2 SOooooo h2 CatBoost Won the match h2 Submission h2 I hope this Kernel was helpful to you ﾉ ﾉ h2 Please Upvote this Kernel if you like it
description: com photos science or medical background with molecules and atoms picture id852106780 s 170667a w 1007 This kernel is based on the kaggle competition Predicting Molecular Properties https www. Atom The atom is the smallest object that retains the properties of an element. The Plotly visualizations ran fine before commiting and also they were some awesome 3D visualizations. com artgor molecular properties eda and models Lets see which regressor works better CatBoost or my all time favourite KNN regressor. values 0 N mode markers marker dict size 5 color structures atom_index set color to an array list of desired values colorscale Jet choose a colorscale opacity 0. Layout title Molecule Structures scene dict xaxis dict title X yaxis dict title Y zaxis dict title Z margin dict l 0 r 0 b 0 t 0 Implementation with Plotly data go. Scatter y train scalar_coupling_constant N x scalar dso N mode markers name Diamagnetic spin orbit marker dict opacity 0. read_csv Any results you write to the current directory are saved as output. values 0 N z dipole Z. Scatter3d x structures x. 64 margin dict l 0 r 0 b 0 t 0 Implementation with Plotly trace0 go. Please fork this kernel un comment out the plotly visualization sections and you would also enjoy some awesome 3D visualization. Scatter3d x dipole X. Dipole Moment A dipole moment is a measurement of the separation of two opposite electrical charges. values 0 N y dipole Y. values 0 N mode markers marker dict size 5 color dipole Z set color to an array list of desired values colorscale Jet choose a colorscale opacity 0. com todnewman keras neural net for champs Andrew Lukyanenko https www. values 0 N z structures z. 5 trace2 go. Molecules A molecule is a particle made up of two or more atoms that are chemically bonded together the number of atomic nuclei making up a molecule is a determinate number. Scatter y train scalar_coupling_constant N x scalar sd N mode markers name Spin dipolar marker dict opacity 0. Potential energy Potential energy is that energy which an object has because of its position. 2 line dict width 0. 5 trace1 go. Implementation with plotly trace1 go. SPECIAL NOTE I have used both matplotlib and plotly for visualization purpose but I have commented out the plotly visualizations because every time I tried to Commit and Run it took more than eight hours and failed after that. While Using Plotly Scalar Coupling of Molecules Mulliken charge of the atom magnetic shielding tensors 3d Surface Pot Training Data Set Relation between Scalar Coupling Y axis Spin dipolar Paramagnetic spin orbit Diamagnetic spin orbit Model Implementation Pre Process DataSource of inspiration for the code Tod Newman https www. Introduction Molecules http media. Please Upvote this Kernel if you like it. Surface z magnetic. Scatter y train scalar_coupling_constant N x scalar pso N mode markers name Paramagnetic spin orbit marker dict opacity 0. 5 train pd. It is called potential energy because it has the potential to be converted into other forms of energy such as kinetic energy. merge train scalar how left left_on molecule_name atom_index_0 atom_index_1 type right_on molecule_name atom_index_0 atom_index_1 type right_on molecule_name atom_index_0 atom_index_1 type. The magnitude is equal to the charge multiplied by the distance between the charges and the direction is from negative charge to positive charge μ q r where μ is the dipole moment q is the magnitude of the separated charge and r is the distance between the charges. Layout title Dipole Moments scene dict xaxis dict title X yaxis dict title Y zaxis dict title Z margin dict l 0 r 0 b 0 t 0 Implementation with Plotly trace2 go. Eight versions of my kernel failed like that. Dipole moments are a vector quantity. com c champs scalar coupling overview. CatBoost Won the match. Data Visualizations Dipole Moment of Molecules Molecular Structure with respect to atomic index View it with respect to X Z plane to watch a donut shaped pattern. values 0 N y structures y.
